biography: Lassi, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, brings a wealth of experience to the greens. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Lassi is known for his calculated approach and unwavering focus, traits that have made him a formidable competitor over the years. Off the course, Lassi is known for his dry wit and penchant for intricate puzzles.

With 7 past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Lassi has consistently demonstrated his commitment to this prestigious event. While the coveted Hector Trophée title has eluded him thus far, his exceptional skills led him to one Victor Trophy. Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his eighth appearance in the competition.

Those who have played alongside Lassi know him as a thoughtful and considerate teammate, always ready with a word of encouragement or a strategic suggestion. It remains to be seen whether Lassi will finally be able to lift the Hector Trophée.
